post.author: Mordenkainen
post.body: Few games have had a real impact in my life. DOOM is one of them. Bring on the demons!

post.author: Burrito
post.body:
One of my friends always was green doom guy in deathmatch because his computer was the fastest. I hated green.

Besides that who knows a more satisfying way of shooting something then the Doom Rocket Launcher?

post.author: Kristus
post.body: http://www.doomworld.com/php/topstory.php?id=3194 <- Cacowards posted!
